content.rendered:
Directed by Rahul Sadasivan

Written by Rahul Sadasivan. Sreekumar Shreyas

Star Shane Nigam (Vinu). Revathi (Asha). Saiju Kurup (George). Valsala Menon (Grandmother). James Eliya (Madhu). Athira Patel (Priya). Abhiram Pothuval (Shyam (as Abhiram Radhakrishnan)). Babu Annur (Rajan). Gilu Joseph (Dr. Beena). Arun Sunny (Dr. Sreekumar). Sabumon Abdusamad (Interviewer 1). Shankar Ramachandran (Interviewer 2). Manu Jose (Anand). Hena Pattel (Anand’s Wife). Riyas Narmakala (School Principal). Sneha Sreekumar (Vice Principal). Manju Pathrose (Neighbour). Noushad Shahul (Neighbour). Kaladharan (Priest). Aani Varapuzha (Shyam’s Mother). Ramani Peethambaran (Shyam’s Grandmother). Vinod Thomas (Pharmacy Staff). Arya Menon (George’s Wife). Anna Paul (Madhu’s Wife)

Language Malayalam

Producers Sunila Habeeb. Teresa Rani

Production Anwar Rasheed Entertainment. Plan T Films. Shane Nigam Films
